article_title: Why Some People Oppose Expanding Government Aid To The Poor

article_metadata.description: Opposing an expansion of the welfare state does not mean a person hates the poor, is greedy or selfish, or is somehow a bad person. There are plenty of legitimate reasons to object to more government aid to the poor; here are a few.
article_metadata.author: Jeffrey Dorfman
